metadata.synopsis: Tells the finishing part of the story conveyed by the paintings in a puzzle. Does finish the story correctly.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on S_WYR_PaintingPuzzle_SolutionPainting2_b878885e-8efa-42c7-a9bd-8238e08d5fad or any other instance of UNI_WYR_PaintingPuzzle_SolutionPainting2_827df830-08c1-4a7a-8201-8cf7faa6736b

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *'Freedom.' A red-haired man walks the streets of Baldur's Gate, clad in a billowing cloak.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *You catch a glimpse of a sly smile beneath his hood and a golden coin in his hand.*
